title: Spatter Phenomenon Analysis and Optimization Project in L-PBF Additive Manufacturing

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental metalworking and thermodynamics concepts, high school-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Learning centered on experimental data analysis and visualization using digital devices (laptops, analytical software). Performance of simulation tasks mimicking real industrial problems.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively measure spatter particle ejection angles and sizes using high-speed video analysis technology
Learners can mathematically model how changes in laser power, scanning speed, and energy density affect spatter generation
Learners can automatically classify spatter patterns in experimental data by applying machine learning-based image segmentation techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
